You are given an array of $n$ integers: $a_1, a_2, ..., a_n$. There are $m$ queries. Each query is described by three integers $l_i$, $r_i$, and $k_i$. 

Query $l_i$, $r_i$, $k_i$ means to add $k_i$ to each element of the array from index $l_i$ to $r_i$ (inclusive).

After processing all the queries, print the final array.  The values in the array can be large, so print them modulo $10^9 + 7$.

You are given a list of numbers. You will be given multiple updates, each specifying a range of numbers in the list and a value to add to each number in that range. After each update, print the updated list.
